headline: Builders FirstSource Launches Offering of $500 Million of Senior Notes due 2035
summary: IRVING, Texas, May 05, 2025--Builders FirstSource, Inc. (NYSE: BLDR) ("Builders FirstSource" or the "Company") today announced that it has launched an offering of $500 million aggregate principal amount of unsecured Senior Notes due 2035 (the "Notes").
